sidebar.about: Hi there, I’m Aaron and I am passionate about the web. I love to [write](/publications/), [speak](/speaking-engagements/), and [share](/appearances/) everything I know. I live & work in Seattle, <abbr aria-title="Washington">WA</abbr>. Want to know more? [Read on](/about/).
sidebar.events: I often travel for conferences. If I’m coming to your city and you’d like to arrange a private training or consultation while I’m there, feel free to [reach out](/contact/).
